app_descript:
XFINITY Stream

Brief: The XFINITY Stream app is your portable solution to accessing live and on-demand television shows, movies, and Cloud DVR recordings. Ideal for Xfinity service subscribers, this app allows you to take your entertainment wherever you go in the US, with the convenience of offline viewing and easy synchronicity with your X1 Cloud DVR.
